thread.title: Reports – Russell Wilson Accepts Grim Denver Broncos Fate Ahead of March Climax
thread.title_full: Reports – Russell Wilson Accepts Grim Denver Broncos Fate Ahead of March Climax - EssentiallySports

author: Abhinav Prakash
title: Reports – Russell Wilson Accepts Grim Denver Broncos Fate Ahead of March Climax
text:
Denver Broncos are facing a QB crisis right now. Sean Payton decided to bench Russell Wilson in the game against the Houston Texans and the Broncos still faced a close defeat. Since then, Wilson and the team in general have been surrounded by a lot of questions. This may be the QB’s last season with the Denver Broncos.
Dianna Russini, the NFL insider tweeted more information about the pressing issue against Russell Wilson. The QB is under a lot of stress right now and so are the Denver Broncos. But at such a crucial time, is it advisable to bench one of the most prolific QBs in the league? Dianna Russini’s tweet gives us more insight into the conundrum.
Is this it for Russell Wilson and the Broncos? ADVERTISEMENT
Article continues below this ad
The 6-6 Broncos might soon be ruled out of the playoffs race. In the wake of this, Russini tweeted out that Russell Wilson is expecting to be released by the Denver Broncos permanently. Per the NFL insider, the thought has been bothering Russell Wilson for nearly two months and he is expecting to be ousted from the Broncos in March. However, for a lot of people, this is an ill-advised decision.
Russell Wilson is expecting to be cut by the Denver Broncos in March, per league sources. For almost two months, the quarterback has been starting knowing the organization was most likely going to move on him from after this season.
— Dianna Russini (@DMRussini) December 28, 2023

‘Ethical Billionaire’ Taylor Swift Under Fire for High CO2 Emissions Amidst Travis Kelce Romance December 28, 2023 12:16 am EDT

Follow Us
This has caused a lot of turbulence in the Broncos and some unsavory details have come to light about both entities. Per Russini, Wilson was never informed when he would be benched this season and for how long. Russell Wilson was playing as a starter until he was not! Wilson’s contract with the Broncos runs through 2028 and it seems like the Denver team is cutting corners when it comes to taking care of their own.
It was explained, the Broncos never told Wilson if or when they would bench him this season, he just played until he was told this morning he was no longer starting.
— Dianna Russini (@DMRussini) December 28, 2023
To be level-headed about the whole situation, Russini also disclosed some financial roadblocks that the Broncos are facing to honor their contract with the QB.
Fact Check: Did Russell Wilson Truly Accept His Paycut Amidst Speculation of Broncos’ $85M Dead Cap?
Is this a scheme to oust Russell Wilson? It is to be noted that the Broncos signal-caller has about $37 million in injury guarantees for 2025. The contract will be active from the 5 league day in March 2024. This is a huge amount of monetary exchange that cannot be ignored by either party. So, lawyers were involved in negotiating the details of this contract, however, the contract remains unchanged.
ADVERTISEMENT
Article continues below this ad
Wilson has $37 million in injury guarantees for 2025 that will become guaranteed on the fifth day of the 2024 league year in March. Lawyers, including some with the NFLPA, were involved, and no changes were made to the contract.
— Dianna Russini (@DMRussini) December 28, 2023
To add to the burden the Broncos reached out to Wilson’s management in late October and told them that Wilson would lose his starting job if he didn’t postpone the injury guarantee date for 2025. The whole situation just raises more questions about the franchise.
ADVERTISEMENT

Will Russell Wilson suffer the same fate as Derek Carr ? What do you think about it?
